Posts.Content: I went for a routine screening in Aug 2015, aged 50. I had previously had 2 other routine screenings. This time cancer was found in the very early stages. I had surgery and radiotherapy and now take Tamoxifen. I think routine screening is a must and although not save all lives, I'm sure the ones in the early stages that are saved make it worth while and cost effect. Report
Posts.Title: How Can Help Cancer Screening to Every-one
